entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
